title: Lincoln's WARNING #100014: Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up
script: Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up! Let me tell you something - I seen a lot of BULLSHIT in my time, but THIS?! These clowns got mansions talking about YOUR privilege! Private jets preaching about YOUR carbon! THE NERVE! The muhfuckin AUDACITY! QR code NOW! Listen up. Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up... another distraction from the real theft. While you panic, they're laughing to the bank. Wake up. Bitcoin below.
